scripts.build: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm run generate && pnpm exec tsup"
scripts.dev: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm run generate && pnpm exec tsup --watch"
scripts.generate: doppler run -- sh -c '( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo "Skipping API client generation in act environment" || [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && echo "Skipping API client generation in Docker build" || (cd ../../apps/express-api && pnpm generate-swagger && cd ../../packages/macro-ai-api-client && pnpm exec openapi-ts) )'
scripts.lint: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint . && pnpm exec eslint ."
scripts.lint:fix: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint . --fix && pnpm exec eslint . --fix"
scripts.lint:ci: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint . --max-warnings=0 && pnpm exec eslint . --max-warnings 0"
scripts.test: doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run
scripts.test:coverage: doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run --coverage
